extensionDescription.message: Provides custom search field for smart keywords (bookmark keywords).

switchToRecentlyUsed_tooltip.message: Switch to the view ordeded by Recently Used (Ctrl/⌘ - ←)

switchToAll_tooltip.message: Switch to the view ordeded by Name (Ctrl/⌘ - →)

howToAdd_description.message: There is no bookmark item for keyword search. To start search with keyword, plases right-click on a search field in any webpage and choose "Add a keyword for this Search", or just create a bookmark with a URL including "%s" as a paceholder for the search term. Then they will be listed here and you can search with keyword directly from this panel.

config_defaultOpenIn_backgroundTab.message: a New Background Tab (popup will stay open after search)

config_accelActionOpenIn_caption.message: Open search result for actions with accel key (Ctrl/⌘) in

config_recycleBlankCurrentTab_label.message: Recycle current blank tab, instead of new tab

config_recycleTabUrlPattern_label.message: Recycle more tabs with URI matchis to following regular expression:

config_defaultEngine_label.message: Default search engine when nothing item is selected ("%s" will be replaced to the search term):

config_favIconProvider_label.message: Icon provider ("%s" will be replaced to the origin part of the bookmark's URI:

config_fillFieldWithSelectionText_label.message: Fill search term field with the selection text in the current tab

config_clearFieldAfterSearch_label.message: Clear last search term for the next time

config_clearFieldAfterSearchDelay_before.message: when the next search is started after

config_clearFocusByInput_label.message: Clear focus on search engine by starting of input
